sections.title: Sun Seeker (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Sun Seeker class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with all simple and martial weapons, light and medium armor, and all shields including tower shields.

sections.title: Ancestral Weapon (Su) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Inscribes dwarven runes on a weapon to deal extra damage against giants, goblins, and orcs, and provides Intimidate bonuses against these creatures.

sections.title: Find Citadel (Sp) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Determines the direction to the nearest known dwarven citadel at will, functioning like the know direction spell.

sections.title: Rune-Carved Armor (Su) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Provides a deflection bonus to touch AC against spells and spell-like abilities equal to armor bonus, capped by class level.

sections.title: Commune (Sp) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Allows the use of commune spell once per week as a spell-like ability to contact ancestral spirits.

sections.title: Dwarven Armor Training ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Grants heavy armor proficiency and allows ranger combat style benefits while wearing heavy armor.

sections.title: Darkvision ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Grants darkvision with 60-foot range, or increases existing darkvision range by 30 feet, with additional improvements at 7th level.

sections.title: Runes of Resistance (Su) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Activates as a move action to gain spell resistance based on armor type for a limited number of rounds per day.

sections.title: Paths of the Ancients ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Grants immunity to maze spells and prevents becoming lost in subterranean environments.

sections.title: Stalwart ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Avoids effects entirely on successful Fortitude or Will saves when wearing light/medium armor or no armor.

sections.title: Call to Arms (Sp) (Sun Seeker)
sections.description: Summons 1d4+1 ghostly dwarven allies once per day as a full-round action, functioning like spiritual ally with shared bonuses.
